85b4db7c-40c9-41d9-af95-d96b17aa34a9.description: The Creo Analysis Professional Certification validates advanced-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Before a part is released, it is often analyzed to ensure that it fulfills its original design requirements. Analysts, designers, and engineers who earn the Creo Analysis Professional Certification can validate models using various Finite Element Analysis (FEA) tools and measurement tools.
85b4db7c-40c9-41d9-af95-d96b17aa34a9.name: Creo Analysis Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Creo: Structural Analysis with Creo Simulate, Creo: Real-Time Simulation Using Creo Simulation Live, Creo: Analysis with Creo Ansys Simulation

c4a3c0e8-3a63-4285-8c81-33b781f4ce1e.description: The Creo Assembly Professional Certification validates advanced-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Designers and engineers who earn the Creo Assembly Professional Certification can assemble Creo Parametric models using the proper orientation and placement.
c4a3c0e8-3a63-4285-8c81-33b781f4ce1e.name: Creo Assembly Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Creo: Assembly Productivity Tools, Creo: Managing Large Assemblies, Creo: Assembling with Non-Kinematic Constraints, Creo: Assembling with Kinematic Connections, Creo: Managing Assembly Styles and States, Creo: Using Assembly Skeletons for Top-Down Design

99399798-e197-4277-9905-53e8b8d302da.description: The Creo Associate Certification validates foundational-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Designers and engineers who earn the Creo Associate Certification understand the fundamental tools and functions of Creo, including sketch features, assembly, model properties, and analysis tools.
99399798-e197-4277-9905-53e8b8d302da.name: Creo Associate Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Creo: Fundamentals Overview, Creo: Fundamentals of Modeling 1, Creo: Fundamentals of Modeling 2, Creo: Fundamentals of Assembly, Creo: Fundamentals of 2D Drawing, Creo: Fundamentals of Analysis

207ec364-1b1a-4b8c-9416-58375748ee99.description: The Creo Cabling Professional Certification validates foundational-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Designers and engineers who earn the Creo Cabling Professional Certification can create wiring harnesses in an assembly. They can also route wires and cables to and from the desired connectors.
207ec364-1b1a-4b8c-9416-58375748ee99.name: Creo Cabling Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Creo: Creating Harnesses and Routing Cables 1, Creo: Creating Harnesses and Routing Cables 2

c5f5c9db-c3c9-4111-8507-6f2c3e2cc252.description: The Creo Documentation Professional Certification validates advanced-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Designers and engineers who earn the Creo Documentation Certification can capture design intent of models in Drafting by using annotations and dimensions to fully define 3D geometry for manufacturing.
c5f5c9db-c3c9-4111-8507-6f2c3e2cc252.name: Creo Documentation Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Creo: Populating 2D Drawings with Annotations, Creo: Creating and Modifying 2D Drawing Views, Creo: Adding 2D Drawing Information Using Tables, Creo: Creating Annotations Using Model Based Definition, Creo: Modifying and Publishing Annotations Using Model Based Definition

0391946f-57a7-4235-9475-96493648a8dd.description: The Creo Manufacturing Professional Certification validates advanced-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Designers and engineers who earn the Manufacturing Professional Certification can create lightweight and optimized Creo Parametric models using lattice structures and generative design.
0391946f-57a7-4235-9475-96493648a8dd.name: Creo Manufacturing Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Creo: Design for Additive Manufacturing, Creo: Generative Topology Optimization

dd0e1578-b2b7-4e39-b097-0966d8522a03.description: The Creo Modeling Professional Certification validates advanced-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Designers and engineers who earn the Creo Modeling Professional Certification can capture design intent in Sketcher by creating 2D sketches and by using various tools to create solid 3D geometry.
dd0e1578-b2b7-4e39-b097-0966d8522a03.name: Creo Modeling Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Creo: Modeling Productivity Tools, Creo: Sketching Productivity Tools, Creo: Advanced Modeling 1, Creo: Advanced Modeling 2, Creo: Multibody Design

05597095-5297-41a3-8611-045ead2e9fa3.description: The Creo Sheetmetal Professional Certification validates foundational-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Designers and engineers who earn the Creo Sheetmetal Professional Certification can use Creo to create a sheetmetal model. They can apply the necessary bends, cuts, relief, and punches to create a completed model.
05597095-5297-41a3-8611-045ead2e9fa3.name: Creo Sheetmetal Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Creo: Creating Sheetmetal Models 1, Creo: Creating Sheetmetal Models 2

d3dbb313-ab2b-45c3-936a-7c4f454879f8.description: The Creo Surfacing Professional Certification validates advanced-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Designers and engineers who earn the Creo Surfacing Certification can create complex surface geometry, fix and patch surface models, and create robust curves.
d3dbb313-ab2b-45c3-936a-7c4f454879f8.name: Creo Surfacing Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Creo: Creating Surface Features 1, Creo: Creating Surface Features 2, Creo: Stitching, Editing, and Solidifying Surfaces, Creo: Advanced Surface Modeling, Creo: Conceptual Design Using Subdivision Modeling, Creo: Design for Additive Manufacturing, Creo: Fixing Imported Geometry

73a8d23e-44a9-411f-979e-65a62f0cfb09.description: The Kepware Associate Certification validates foundational-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Professionals who earn the Kepware Associate certification can create Kepware tags to various devices, manage the server, and import and export projects.
73a8d23e-44a9-411f-979e-65a62f0cfb09.name: Kepware Associate Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Kepware: Fundamentals Overview, Kepware: Fundamentals of Connecting with Devices, Kepware: Fundamentals of OPC Connectivity, Kepware: Fundamentals of the Kepware Server Application, Kepware: Fundamentals of Advanced Tags and Database Connectivity, Kepware: Fundamentals of IIoT Connectivity

0ab78bb1-b6cb-4892-896a-95fc02a2b384.description: The ThingWorx Associate Certification validates foundational-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Designers and developers who earn the ThingWorx Associate Certification can apply the ThingWorx development process, build entities in ThingWorx Composer, represent data, and create ThingWorx mashups.
0ab78bb1-b6cb-4892-896a-95fc02a2b384.name: ThingWorx Associate Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: ThingWorx: Fundamentals Overview, ThingWorx: Fundamentals of Experience, ThingWorx: Fundamentals of Modeling 1, ThingWorx: Fundamentals of Modeling 2, ThingWorx: Fundamentals of Creating a Mashup, ThingWorx: Fundamentals of Connectivity, ThingWorx: Fundamentals of Analytics, ThingWorx: Fundamentals of Deployment

3e8af0fe-ec6d-4102-b594-9f4edc33fad3.description: The ThingWorx Deploy Professional Certification validates advanced-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Designers and developers who earn the ThingWorx Deploy Professional Certification can recognize protection and sizing requirements for an IoT system, plan for user needs, describe how ThingWorx data is stored, and compare access control options.
3e8af0fe-ec6d-4102-b594-9f4edc33fad3.name: ThingWorx Deploy Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: ThingWorx: Platform Administration, ThingWorx: Platform Security, ThingWorx: Performance

95b31877-0a73-49cf-acac-02c81aef5b4a.description: The ThingWorx Mashups Professional Certification validates advanced-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Designers and developers who earn the ThingWorx Mashups Professional Certification can create intuitive user interfaces for their IoT applications that utilize templates, design principles, and widget functionality.
95b31877-0a73-49cf-acac-02c81aef5b4a.name: ThingWorx Mashups Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: ThingWorx: Build a Professional Interface, ThingWorx: Integrate Multiple Mashups

99619614-a3ac-4da1-a963-aff871729771.description: The ThingWorx Model Professional Certification validates advanced-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Developers who earn the ThingWorx Model Professional Certification can design and build Things, Thing Templates and Thing Shapes. They can independently author ThingWorx services and implement data structures.
99619614-a3ac-4da1-a963-aff871729771.name: ThingWorx Model Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: ThingWorx: Service Authoring and Wrappers, ThingWorx: Data Structures

ec873a86-1da1-4115-9284-68bf477efd89.description: The Windchill Associate Certification validates foundational knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Designers and engineers who earn the Windchill Associate Certification can demonstrate fundamental knowledge of Windchill. They can navigate the user interface to create and manage work tasks that include using Creo View Lite, implementing the change process, and managing an engineering bill of materials (eBOM).
ec873a86-1da1-4115-9284-68bf477efd89.name: Windchill Associate Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Windchill: Fundamentals Overview, Windchill: Fundamentals of Creating and Managing Work, Windchill: Fundamentals of Change Management, Windchill: Fundamentals of Engineering Bill of Materials (eBOM)

5873a7b4-10b8-46ed-a076-eff6bf2b56b7.description: The Windchill BOM Management Professional Certification validates advanced-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum.BOM Management is a part-centric approach to product development. Earners of the Windchill BOM Management Professional Certification can use best practices to create an engineering BOM (eBOM) and a derived manufacturing BOM (mBOM). They understand the concept of connecting Windchill parts with mechanical CAD data.
5873a7b4-10b8-46ed-a076-eff6bf2b56b7.name: Windchill BOM Management Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Windchill: Preparing eBOM to mBOM Transformation, Windchill: BOM Restructuring, Windchill: Advanced BOM Transformation Topics, Windchill: Advanced BOM Management with Connected CAD Structures

611cc3de-c813-47c9-a1a6-578aa4463b86.description: The Windchill Business Administration Professional Certification validates advanced-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Business administrators who earn this professional certification can analyze users’ needs, manage participant access to organization data, and conduct monitoring and maintenance activities.
611cc3de-c813-47c9-a1a6-578aa4463b86.name: Windchill Business Administration Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Windchill: Introduction and Participant Administration, Windchill: Object and Context Administration, Windchill: Advanced Object Behavior, Windchill: Process Mapping and Promotion Request, Windchill: Teams and Access, Windchill: Access Control and Change Implementation

2c39c333-6c33-4538-b7e1-f994568d3760.description: The Windchill CAD Integration Professional Certification validates advanced-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Designers and engineers who earn this professional certification can run concurrent design and data management activities with colleagues to reduce time to market.
2c39c333-6c33-4538-b7e1-f994568d3760.name: Windchill CAD Integration Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Windchill: Creo Parametric Data Management 1, Windchill: Creo Parametric Data Management 2

639ab1d4-1949-435e-9134-f024eb94c930.description: The Windchill System Administration Professional Certification validates advanced-level knowledge and application taught in PTC University’s LEARN Online curriculum. Those who earn the Windchill System Administration Professional Certification have a deep understanding of PLM system architecture and maintenance activities. They can manage data storage and monitor the system’s performance.
639ab1d4-1949-435e-9134-f024eb94c930.name: Windchill System Administration Professional Certification Exam 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Recommended: Windchill: Installation and Configuration Overview, Windchill: File Vaulting and Replication, Windchill: Queues and Visualization Services, Windchill: Maintenance Activities, Windchill: Tuning and Backup, Windchill: Properties and Monitoring
